General.Name: Mahamaya Steel Industries Limited
General.Description: Mahamaya Steel Industries Limited manufactures and sells structural steel products in India. The company provides angles, H-beams, joists, channels, billets, I-beams, blooms, rounds, flats, railway sleepers, strips, girders, etc. It serves construction, automobile, railway, and power industries. The company was formerly known as Rajesh Strips Limited and changed its name to Mahamaya Steel Industries Limited in 2009. Mahamaya Steel Industries Limited was incorporated in 1988 and is based in Raipur, India.

2.Name: Ms. Jaswinder Kaur Mission
